$schema.description: The schema version for this configuration file. Must be a valid schema version.

execScriptCommand.description: The command to execute the script, must include the placeholder '${post}' and can have any file extension or none.

outputDir.description: The output directory for the generated migrations. Must be a valid directory path.

migrationsDir.description: The directory where migrations are stored. Must be a valid directory path.

tempDir.description: Temporary directory for processing. Must be a valid directory path.

log.description: Log level for the script, must be one of 'info', 'debug', or 'error'.
